items.task: Understand GSoC 2024 timeline and eligibility criteria
Set up and familiarize with GitHub profile and Git workflow
Identify 2-3 areas of interest (e.g., Web Dev, ML, OS)
Research past GSoC organizations related to identified interests
Explore project ideas from 3-5 potential organizations
Start engaging with selected organization communities (mailing lists, Discord, forums)
Make first small open-source contribution (e.g., documentation fix, bug report) to a relevant project
Deepen coding skills in the required tech stack for a chosen project idea
Draft initial project proposal for primary organization
Seek feedback on proposal from potential mentors/community members
